website_summaries.verdict: This model earns high marks for looks, plus it's practical for most users' needs - a good choice if aesthetic appeal is your top priority.
pros: Stands out for its diamond design and sleek build that looks good without framing
Aluminum construction is lightweight and easy to install, yet sturdy
cons: Doesn't come with peg hooks, and not quite as rugged as steel models
but it tops the competitors on looks

customer_reviews.title: Not actual size
customer_reviews.text: It is not 24” by 48” the ones I got were six inches short
customer_reviews.author: joshua ohlenroth

customer_reviews.title: maybe I'm dumb, but the "X2" led me to believe I ...
customer_reviews.text: maybe I'm dumb, but the "X2" led me to believe I would get two 24X48 panels... and the fact its actually 21 inches..
customer_reviews.author: chandra

customer_reviews.title: It is not a true 24 x48 in peace
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s finish and would have been a great buy but it is not 24 x 48 not happy
customer_reviews.author: stephen t.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong everything.
customer_reviews.text: Description says x2, very misleading product. Should have read reviews before buying, need more of this but going with a different product now.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Tricked into thinking it was two pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the other reviews before ordering- I thought it was going to be two pieces. For one piece, it is way too expensive. This is bogus, a trick, a con job.
customer_reviews.author: AZ1

customer_reviews.title: The product description says this is 24" x 48". ...
customer_reviews.text: The product description says this is 24" x 48" .... the actual product dimensions are 21.5" x 45.5" ... decent product but after doing more research - way overpriced for what you get...
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Erickson

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the other reviews before making a purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I wish i had read the other reviews first. The X2 had me believe i was getting 2 peices. Its more than i wanted to spend for 1 peice.
customer_reviews.author: Read the fine print

customer_reviews.title: I only received 1 pegboard.
customer_reviews.text: The description says that there are 2 peg boards, but I only received 1.
customer_reviews.author: C.Starr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: makes my wall in my garage great ! may buy more for my outdoor shed
customer_reviews.author: william j. buckley 3rd

customer_reviews.title: ... is 21 1/2" by 45 3/4" Not at all Pleased..
customer_reviews.text: It is 21 1/2" by 45 3/4" Not at all Pleased...... Will Not Hold as Described..........
customer_reviews.author: Dennison R. Kangas

product_meta.title: PegBoard X2 24"x48" Diamond Plate
product_meta.description: PegBoard X2 is the next generation storage and organizational tool. Holds up to 1 ton. Don't try that with an ordinary pressed wood peg board. The PegBoard X2 is built with heavy duty metal construction and will never rust, rot, corrode or degrade like traditional pegboard. The peg hook holes will stay true for a lifetime. The Strongest PegBoard on the Planet. Unlike traditional pegboard, the PegBoard X2. requires no additional framing - just screw into wall and it is ready to go. No maintenance required. Use for storage, organization and display. For industry, retail spaces, garages, kitchens and more. Looks great, works even better.
feature_bullets: Heavy Duty - up to 1 ton maximum capacity with evenly distributed load
No Framing Required - all 4 sides flanged 3/4" for rigidity & clearance of peg hooks. No additional framing or spacers reqd
More durable and rugged - than traditional pressed wood peg boards. Will not rust, rot, corrode, or degrade
Fits all standard peg hooks - accepts both 1/8" and 1/4" peg hooks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars21 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
